# ancel.co.ke

> Portfolio and developer journal of Ancel â€” full-stack engineer. Projects, case studies, and writing on web development, real-time systems, and scaling.

## Main

- [Home](https://ancel.co.ke/): Landing, hero, and highlights
- [About](https://ancel.co.ke/about): Bio, skills, and background
- [Projects](https://ancel.co.ke/projects): Project gallery and links
- [Case Studies](https://ancel.co.ke/case-studies): In-depth case studies (TaskForge, e-learning, finance tracker, fitness, habit tracker, events, travel, banking, EduChain, LedgerX, OpsFlow, SignFlow, NestFi, EduManage, Aegis, and more)
- [Developer Journal / Blog](https://ancel.co.ke/blog): Articles and technical posts (also at /developer-journal)
- [Timeline](https://ancel.co.ke/timeline): Career and project timeline
- [Tech Stack](https://ancel.co.ke/stack): Technologies and tools
- [Fun](https://ancel.co.ke/fun): Side projects and experiments
- [Labs & Experiments](https://ancel.co.ke/labs-experiments): Experimental work
- [Contact](https://ancel.co.ke/contact): Get in touch
